name: Swanna
description: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

abilities.name: Sky Circus
abilities.effect: If you played Bird Keeper from your hand during this turn, ignore all Energy in this Pokémon’s attack costs.

attacks.name: Feather Slice
attacks.effect: You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this attack does 70 more damage.
